snippet: The deadly episode was the first reported instance in 2014 of what are called green-on-blue attacks, in which uniformed Afghans turn on their Western allies.
abstract: Two people wearing Afghan security forces uniforms open fire on American-led coalition soldiers in eastern Afghanistan, killing two of the soldiers.
lead_paragraph: The deadly episode was the first reported instance in 2014 of what are called green-on-blue attacks, in which uniformed Afghans turn on their Western allies.

headline.main: 2 U.S.-Led Coalition Soldiers Are Killed by Attackers in Afghan Uniforms
headline.print_headline: 2 Coalition Soldiers Killed by Attackers in Afghan Uniforms
